item.title: Inflation Reduction Act Webinar Series: Section 179 â€“ Energy Efficient Commercial Buildings
item.description: Watch the recording of our webinar covering section 179D, one of the biggest tax incentives in the Inflation Reduction Act, providing a savings of up to $5.00 per square foot for energy efficiency improvements to commercial buildings.

item.title: IRA Commercial Solar Tax Incentives Explained
item.description: Watch the recording of our webinar covering the commercial solar tax incentives provided by the IRA.

item.title: IRA Webinar on August 8

item.title: Free Webinar: Discussing the Game-Changing Environmental Legislation
item.description: Join us August 8th, 2023 for a free educational webinar as we delve into the inflation reduction act, discussing its impact and opportunities.
